channel.title: [PI] Dropped items dissapearing
channel.description:
Hi everyone,
For some reason on the server all dropped items dissapear, except those dropped after PKing or from monsters. I would love to hold drop events where people can earn some extra cash,
Thanks, Gergy. xWeedscape
EDIT: Fixed it, the file is called dropitem.java and 1 line of code was //commented out
